Special Powers
NUDGE IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION: Mind Control. When Empath uses it, after resolutions give a hit character a Thrall token if they don't already have one. // When Empath uses Mastermind, he can instead choose an adjacent opposing character with a Thrall token regardless of keywords or point value. // When a character with a Thrall token takes damage from an attack, remove their Thrall token.

Yeah man, I was pretty excited to get a new Empath, but he's so awkwardly designed and hard to use that he didn't even make it onto my Wants list. Which, given my love for the Hellions series, is really saying something.

Maxphyte
Month 3, the team I went after had The White Sword and Empath. I tried to KO The White Sword but failed at that (The White Sword evaded the attack that would have KO’d them)… so after that I decided to just go after Empath because he’s only slightly cheaper and I had enough ways to multi target and make sure he couldn’t mastermind effectively.

November 5, 2022
tyroclix
W/L: 1-0 No one will ever convince me this cost wasn't an error. It had to be on the template the "designer" started on and he/she forgot to change the cost. 75 points for this is insane. Short range, 0 move and attack, and low movement. If he had side-step, an 8 range, or triple targets, he'd be 25 points over-costed. As is, he should be at most 45 points in today's game. He was always a brunette when he appeared in stories I read. Really disappointing.
